descr: "A clinical condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that has risen to a level of concern."

fields.name: summary
fields.descr: "A simple summary of the stage such as \"Stage 3\". The determination of the stage is disease-specific."

fields.name: assessment
fields.descr: "Reference to a formal record of the evidence on which the staging assessment is based."
